abstract: NHL Roundup; Chicago Blackhawks defeat St Louis Blues, 3-2, to tie first-round playoff series, 1-1; other hockey playoff news noted.

headline.print_headline: Blackhawks Even Series; Detroit Falls to Lightning
headline.main: Blackhawks Even Series; Detroit Falls to Lightning

snippet: The Blackhawks, the defending Stanley Cup champions, pulled even with the Blues in their first-round series with a 3-2 victory Friday night in St. Louis.
lead_paragraph: The Blackhawks, the defending Stanley Cup champions, pulled even with the Blues in their first-round series with a 3-2 victory Friday night in St. Louis.
